https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vpKnM9Vc8jADfOfhM9ftOCimKv9.jpg Lichter is an episodic tale from Hans-Christian Schmid about the life on the border between Germany and Poland. The film sheds light on the everyday stories of escape and desperateness. Distant Lights
